channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.2.5
item.description:
This is the August 2019 quarterly update for PostgreSQL.

  • PostgreSQL 11.5 with PostGIS 2.5.2
  • PostgreSQL 10.10 with PostGIS 2.4.7
  • PostgreSQL 9.6.15 with PostGIS 2.3.9
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.19 with PostGIS 2.2.8

PostgreSQL 12beta3 is available separately and can be download from postgresapp.com/downloads.html
